title: How to Use This App
details: Tap on the Steps below to see details.

steps.title: Tap A Step To See More
steps.details: Tapping let's you see a step; edit its name and details; and add sub-steps.

steps.title: Return to First-Step to See How
Tap the 'Steps' Button Until It Says 'Procedure'
steps.details: At the top-left

steps.title: On an iPad or iPhone Plus
Tap the 'Master' Button at the Top-Left
steps.details: If the blue table of Procedure names is not visible

steps.title: Select the Name of the Procedure You Are In
Follow the Delete Process on the First-Step Page
Return to First-Step to See How
On an iPad or iPhone Plus
Tap the 'Master' Button at the Top-Left
steps.details: If the blue table of Procedure names is not visible.

steps.title: Tap the Name of the Procedure You Are In
Tap the 'Steps' Button Until It Says 'Procedure '
steps.details: At the top-left

steps.title: Follow the Move Process on the First-Step Page
Tap the 'Save' Button
steps.details: This replaces 'Edit' button during editing.

steps.title: Return to the First-Step Page to See How
Tap the 'Steps' Button Until It Says 'Procedure'
steps.details: At the top-left

steps.title: On an iPad or iPhone Plus
Tap the 'Master' Button at the Top-Left
steps.details: If the blue table of Procedure names is not visible

steps.title: Select the Name of the Procedure You Are In
Follow the Add Sub-Step Process on the First-Step
Add Another Step
steps.details: How to add a sub-step or same-level step

steps.title: Add a Sub-Step
steps.details: A sub-step provides how to information about the step of this page.

steps.title: Tap the '+' Symbol
steps.details: At the top-right

steps.title: Tap the Sub-Step to Edit It
Tap the 'Save' Button
steps.details: It replaces the 'Edit'button once that has been tapped.

steps.title: Move the Sub-Step to Correct Position
steps.details: In the same table only

steps.title: Touch the 3 'Grab' Bars
steps.details: At the right end of the sub-step. Hold until the sub-step floats

steps.title: Drag the Sub-Step Up or Down
steps.details: Within the 'Do' table ONLY

steps.title: Return to the Previous Step
steps.details: The page where you tapped the '+' symbol

steps.title: Tap the 'Steps' Button
steps.details: At the top-left

steps.title: Add a Step of the Same Level
steps.details: A same-level step will appear on the previous page as a sub-step along with the step of this page

steps.title: Return to Previous Page
steps.details: Previous page will be the same level as the step of the existing page.

steps.title: Tap the Steps Button
steps.details: Located at the top-left of this page

steps.title: Add a Step
steps.details: This step will be of the same level as the step you were just viewing.

steps.title: Follow the Usual Process
steps.details: To see that process, follow the steps below

steps.title: Return to the First-step of This Procedure
steps.details: First-step is the initial step visible after selecting a procedure.

steps.title: Follow the Steps of the 'Add Another Step' Process
Create A New Procedure
steps.details: Tapping shows step-by-step instructions.

steps.title: Tap the Top-Left Back-Button
steps.details: If the Procedures page on the left is not visible, tap the back-button, or Master, at the top-left of this page.

steps.title: Tap the Plus '+' Sign
steps.details: Tap the Plus '+' sign on the Procedures page to add a first-step.

steps.title: Start Adding Sub-Steps
steps.details: Go back to this Procedure's first-step to see details.

steps.title: Give the New Procedure a Name
steps.details: Change the default 'Tap to Edit Name'.

steps.title: Enter a Name in the 'Name' Text Field
steps.details: Default text will disappear when text field is tapped.

steps.title: Enter Details
steps.details: Details will not be visible on the Procedures page, but will be visible on the First-step page.

steps.title: Tap the Details Text View
steps.details: Details text view (140-character limit) is for explanations.

steps.title: Remove Default Text
steps.details: Two options

steps.title: Use the Back Button
steps.details: The back / delete button is the left-facing arrow-shaped button at the top-right on the keyboard.

steps.title: Tap Button until Unwanted Text Is Gone
Hold Any Word a Couple of Seconds
Grab a Handle
steps.details: One of the little blue balls

steps.title: Drag Handle(s)
steps.details: Until text is covered

steps.title: Tap 'Cut'
steps.details: The button that appears automatically

steps.title: Add Any Important Points
steps.details: 140-character limit

steps.title: Delete A Step
steps.details: This will delete all sub-steps of that step as well.

steps.title: Either, Slide the Step to the Left
Tap the Red Circle
steps.details: Appears at the left end of the step when 'Edit' has been tapped

steps.title: Import A Procedure
steps.details: Either Download, or Copy / Paste JSON

steps.title: Tap the Button that Looks Like a Gear
steps.details: At the top-left of the Procedure table page

steps.title: Import a String of the Procedure in JSON Format
Paste Procedure in the Text View
steps.details: The default text will automatically disappear.

steps.title: Tap Anywhere Outside the Text View
Tap the 'Save' Button
steps.details: An alert will inform if successfully saved or not. (Make sure your Procedure JSON is in the right format.)

steps.title: Return to the Procedures Table (Blue)
steps.details: The latest import should be the top one.

steps.title: Copy A Procedure In JSON Format
steps.details: Easiest way is to copy a Procedure shared via email, or saved to your Notes.

steps.title: Tap The Plus Button
steps.details: Top right corner of the white table (not the blue one)

steps.title: Either, Download Procedure
steps.details: From the Developer-vetted site

steps.title: Tap One Of The Procedures In The Table
Confirm The Name
steps.details: In the first part of the JSON that appears in the text field

steps.title: Return To The Blue Procedures Table
steps.details: Your most recent import should be the top Procedure.

steps.title: Share A Procedure
steps.details: Transferring a JSON string version

steps.title: Go to the First-Step
steps.details: It's the first page after selecting a Procedure.

steps.title: Tap the Share Button
steps.details: At the top-right. (It looks like a box with an arrow sticking out, pointing up.)

steps.title: Choose Either Mail or Notes
steps.details: This will create and export a string of the Procedure in JSON format.

steps.title: Mark A Step As Completed
steps.details: This action is reversible.

steps.title: Slide the Step to the Right
steps.details: The step will be placed in the green 'Done' table that appears. Slide a green 'Done' step to the right to return it to the 'Do' table.
